name: Tall Bagel 2: Avocado Hardtack
description:
In 2020, the year without awkward family dinners, we brought you Tall Bagel, an excruciating simulated dinner.

In 2021, we must all reckon with the return of awkward dinners... and the next chapter in the Tall Bagel saga.

The full cast of Tall Bagel returns for a fateful encounter. Play once again as silent millennial dinner-eater Mar, except this time you have telekinesis and can also see people's bones.

  • Writing, Scripting, Audio, Design: Laura Michet
  • Code, Art, Design: Brendon Chung
  • Music: Choroplethora
  • Cross-platform Special Thanks: Ethan Lee

We recommend playing Tall Bagel 1 before playing Tall Bagel 2. Tall Bagel 1 and 2 are both about 15 minutes long each.

Note: Tall Bagel 2 is moddable! The Tall Bagel 2 download contains mod development instructions. Use this game to create your own terrible dinners!
